snippet: President Jacob Zuma of South Africa visited former President Nelson Mandela in the hospital on Thursday, saying that Mr. Mandela’s health had improved but that he remained in serious condition.
abstract: South African Pres Jacob Zuma, after visiting former Pres Nelson Mandela in hospital, reports Mandela's health has improved but that he remains in serious condition.
lead_paragraph: President Jacob Zuma of South Africa visited former President Nelson Mandela in the hospital on Thursday, saying that Mr. Mandela’s health had improved but that he remained in serious condition.
